title: WTB - N172 Old Judge ANY Minneapolis or St. Paul Player
author: matthewmshaver

posts.post_title: WTB - N172 Old Judge ANY Minneapolis or St. Paul Player
posts.post_content: Hey all, new to the site but not new to collecting. Finished up my T206 hometown Minneapolis and St. Paul set recently (pic attached from my Twitter account just for fun!) and figured it was time to dip my toe into the 19th century. Not looking for anything super high end, but would happily take a look at any Minneapolis or St. Paul folks have available. Thanks!
